title: Von der Leyen calls for crackdown on ‘unnecessary’ national laws
summary_full: “It is time for a deep regulatory housecleaning – at all levels,” the European Commission chief said as she called for an end to "gold-plating" of EU laws
summary_public: “It is time for a deep regulatory housecleaning – at all levels,” the European Commission chief said as she called for an end to "gold-plating" of EU laws
